grab: ## Accessing container in google cloud build
views:
1. login `gcloud auth login`
2. if you don't know the project to point to check via `gcloud projects list`
3. point to the selected project `gcloud config set project my-project`
4. do `gcloud container clusters list` to get the cluster name and zone
5. connect to the cluster `gcloud container clusters get-credentials ckan-cloud-cluster --zone europe-west1`
6. if you don't know the name of the pod namespace `kubectl get namespaces`
7. list all the pods in the namespace `kubectl get pods -n dx-helm-project`
8. access any of the pod via `kubectl exec -it my-project-pod -n dx-helm-project  -- /bin/bash`
